Articles.Content:
Is there video of the ship at the bottom of the new web page actually flying (with commentary to explain the no doubt mind boggling staging) ...?

And if so why is it not linked, pinned, reddited, shared, tweeted, or at least youtubed ...

(manically Obsessed)

Alacrity

Is there video of the ship at the bottom of the new web page actually flying (with commentary to explain the no doubt mind boggling staging) ...?

And if so why is it not linked, pinned, reddited, shared, tweeted, or at least youtubed ...

(manically Obsessed)

Alacrity

That is a really old picture from a much older beta version. It still has the launch tower (which was removed because it limited craft size and resulted in many collisions). I'm surprised they put that on the new website. You'd think they would use 1.0 screenshots.

But the clouds are just a lie.

I think that one is actually from an earlier build of KSP (pre 0.19), based on the launch tower being present behind the rocket, doubt it would fly very well, that really is some odd staging, it looks almost like the outboard fuel tanks , no visible engines on them, are mounted on double stacked decouplers...

Dont care when it was... Just want to see that thing fly.... I can see the details well enough to to rebuild, and all ready the stagin has gotten past me. Must see flight vid

(Getting more Manic)

Alacrity
